channel.title: How to change client and source IP's
channel.description:
Hey i am having serrious problems with my server....i have a friend over xbox that wants to host it, he can host, but he doesnt know how. i coded the server myself 100% from scratch and im about to give up becuase i cant find a hoster. can someone please tell me how to do the following in DETAIL.
Im using PI hybrid-pvp
i need know...
how to change the ip in the source...
how to change the ip in the client... and by doing this will there be a download cleint or a desktop client as apposed to a web.
thats all please pm me i really need ur help i got this far i really dont wana give up. :(

item.title: How to change client and source IP's
item.dc:creator: @Forsakinpkers Forsakinpkers
item.description:
@Forsakinpkers wrote:

yes then change that to his no-ip and compile and upload it and it will work

Read full topic

item.title: How to change client and source IP's
item.dc:creator: @extihsee extihsee
item.description:
@extihsee wrote:

in the client would it be like

server = “127.0.0.1”;

Read full topic
item.source: How to change client and source IP's

item.title: How to change client and source IP's
item.dc:creator: @Doggie_Skill Doggie Skill
item.description:
@Doggie_Skill wrote:

1.) What do you mean by changing the IP for the source?

2.) In the client files, there should be a client.java. Open that, and Hit Ctrl + F. Search setserver. Put the Server IP there. Compile, and restart client. If there isn’t a client.java, try Gui.java. Search the same thing. And if there isn’t a Gui.java, I cant help you.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change client and source IP's
